La Salle, René Robert, Sieur de.word: La Salle, René Robert, Sieur de
La Salle, René Robert, Sieur de.translat: (1643–87) a French explorer who travelled through North America, down the Mississippi River, and claimed a large area of the southern part of North America for France, naming it Louisiana. He was killed by his followers when another expedition he was leading was unsuccessful and they got lost.
